projects.title: Underground Universal
projects.description: Designed and developed a dynamic website for Underground Universal, a groundbreaking hip-hop label dedicated to empowering artists with full royalty control. Leveraging cutting-edge technology, the platform underscores the commitment to nurturing creative autonomy and fostering artists' success.

projects.title: Diffusion Board Creator
projects.description: Created an innovative web application enabling users to curate and personalize their preferred online content, offering the convenience of utilizing a Chrome extension or manually adding URLs to meticulously organize blog posts, tweets, YouTube videos, and more into custom boards, fostering seamless sharing with friends.

projects.title: Twitter React App
projects.description: Engineered a high-fidelity replica of the Twitter web application using React.js, featuring essential post, like, and retweet functionalities within a visually identical and responsive user interface, designed for optimal performance across a wide range of devices.

web3Projects.title: Whac-a-NFT
web3Projects.description: Seamlessly integrated NFTs into an engaging, play-to-earn blockchain game reminiscent of Whac-a-Mole, allowing users to showcase their digital assets while also providing access to on-chain leaderboards to track player scores.

web3Projects.title: Solana Wallet Tracker
web3Projects.description: Developed a Solana wallet analysis tool enabling users to effortlessly track both token balances and NFT holdings, serving as a valuable learning project in the realm of Solana development.

web3Projects.title: Solana Pay Store
web3Projects.description: Established an innovative e-commerce platform seamlessly integrated with Solana Pay, empowering users to make purchases using SPL tokens, all built using cutting-edge technology. Inspired from the Buildspace community.

web3Projects.title: Web3 Discovery
web3Projects.description: Developed a pioneering web3 discovery application facilitating effortless exploration of blockchain companies and platforms, offering dynamic filtering, search, and detailed insights into our extensive ecosystem database.
